content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'synapse-course-cosmos-db-ps'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [synapse-course-cosmos-db-ps]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = '*****'
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=synapse-course-cosmos-db-ps;Database=nyctaxidb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'synapse-course-cosmos-db-ps'
) AS [Heartbeat]
